choose.when: SELECT IDQV.DP_AUTH_DATA_ID AS DATA_ID, ${DP_MAX_PERMISSION} AS DATA_PERMISSION FROM (

mapper.sql:
SELECT AUTH.AUTH_RESOURCE, AUTH.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE, ( /*权限值优先级加权，范围越小优先级越高*/ CASE AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE WHEN 'ALL' THEN (1000 + AUTH.AUTH_PERMISSION) WHEN 'ANONYMOUS' THEN (2000 + AUTH.AUTH_PERMISSION) WHEN 'ROLE' THEN (3000 + AUTH.AUTH_PERMISSION) WHEN 'USER' THEN (4000 + AUTH.AUTH_PERMISSION) ELSE ${DP_UNSET_PERMISSION} END ) AS AUTH_PRIORITY_PERMISSION FROM DATAGEAR_AUTHORIZATION AUTH WHERE AUTH.AUTH_ENABLED = 'true' AND AUTH.AUTH_RESOURCE_TYPE = '${DP_RESOURCE_TYPE}' AND ( AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'ALL'
OR AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'ANONYMOUS'
OR ( AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'ROLE' AND AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL IN ( SELECT RO.ROLE_ID FROM DATAGEAR_ROLE_USER RU INNER JOIN DATAGEAR_ROLE RO ON RU.RU_ROLE_ID = RO.ROLE_ID WHERE RU.RU_USER_ID = '${DP_CURRENT_USER.id}' AND RO.ROLE_ENABLED = 'true' ) ) OR (AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' AND AUTH.AUTH_PRINCIPAL = '${DP_CURRENT_USER.id}')
)
